name: Public Safety Communication Europe
legal: Non-profit organisation (Association international de droit belge)
membership: Federation of European Union Fire Officer Associations (FEU)
goal: PSCE is a permanent autonomous organisation, working to foster, by consensus building, excellence in the development and use of public safety communication and information management systems. PSCE provides a forum, where researchers, industry and users can meet to discuss and exchange ideas and best practices, develop roadmaps and improve the future of public safety communications.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
EU policies affecting broadband, spectrum allocation, mobile devices, 5G, satellite communications, as well as public safety, civil protection, cyber security and terrorism.

Common Foreign and Security Policy, European Agenda on Security, EU Digital Single Market Strategy, eCall, EU Civil Protection Mechanism, the work of DG ECHO.
